text: Feria is Latin for "holiday". Feria may refer to: *Feria, in Roman Rite liturgy, a day of the week, other than Sunday, on which no feast is celebrated *Feria (festival) festival in Spain and southern France, characterized by bullfights, bull running in the streets, bodegas *Feria, San Felipe, Zambales barangay in the Philippines *Typhoon Feria *Feria, composition by Maurice Ravel (1875-1937) *Feria (Magnus Lindberg), composition == See also == * Faria (disambiguation) * Ferrier (disambiguation)
title: Feria (disambiguation)
